description: [FRAMESTING](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1120) can retrieve C2 commands from values stored in the `DSID` cookie from the current HTTP request or from decompressed zlib data within the request's `POST` data.(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge Part 2 January 2024)

external_references.description: Lin, M. et al. (2024, January 31). Cutting Edge, Part 2: Investigating Ivanti Connect Secure VPN Zero-Day Exploitation. Retrieved February 27, 2024.
